author: msftrncs
body:
# Steps to reproduce

On Ubuntu 18.04.3 VM on Windows 10 Insiders, PowerShell 7 beta 3 only remains open for about 20 seconds before it closes with no indication as to why.   The shell is usable while its open, but when the time runs out, it closes, whether or not any commands have been entered.

I have a console with PowerShell 6.2.2 open at the same time, and it remains open without incident.

I am NOT an avid Linux user, so I don't know much about how it works.
